items.title: DtaleD
items.des: Join us for an inspiring session with Thajudeen Aboobaker, CEO of UrbanTrash, on August 9, 2024. Gain insights into his transformative journey and engage in interactive discussions.

items.title: Maker Fair
items.des: Join the 𝗠𝗮𝗸𝗲𝗿 𝗙𝗮𝗶𝗿 on August 9, 2024, at Christ College of Engineering to showcase, sell, and network with creative minds. Inaugurated by Mr. Thajudeen Aboobaker.

items.title: Dry Leaves Pelletizer
items.des: Join us on July 15, 2024, for a session on managing dry leaves waste and innovative Dry Leaves Pelletizer technology, presented by V.K. Shyamalan and Kareem K. Puram.

items.title: Maker Fair
items.des: Thank you for your tireless support and dedication throughout the year. Your invaluable contributions and collaboration have driven our success and inspired us all.
